description:

So, recently, that's exactly what I did.

And while I was nursing that cold with shot after shot of good, strong bourbon I was chatting up the strong, hard man next to me. I get him to stand up and show off that perfect body and pecs for days and then I get him to pull down his jeans where we can see his hard cock peeking through his plaid boxers. Once the boxers come off that cock is standing at full attention. You can tell this guy is ready for some action.

Pierce is 21, 5' 10' tall and weighs 165 lbs., but looking at his massive chest and arms you'd swear he weighs more. And the nipples on this guy are the size of silver dollars. title: Pierce
